description: Mustang: This is one time when more than the car gets serviced. Talk about your lube jobs! And did you grab that piston action? External combustion gives way to ejaculating tools and hot rods are geared up for some fast, fast liquid-smooth action. Join Bobby and Mark in the garage and watch the mechanic give some hard service before the warranty expires. Under the car, in the car, on top of the car, this mechanic is eager to please, just as we are pleased to bring these exciting young models to you ? caressing, kissing, sucking, fucking, it all comes under the heading of pleasing the customer. Drive in and have a look ? who knows, maybe you'll run better after seeing it.
title: Teach Me, Scene #02
